head.title: HTML5 Tutorial
head.description: With HTML you can create your own Web site. This tutorial teaches you everything you need to know about HTML.

data: With HTML you can create your own Web site
This tutorial teaches you everything you need to know about HTML.
HTML is easy to learn - You will love it.
This HTML tutorial contains hundreds of HTML examples.
With our online HTML editor you can edit the HTML, click on a button and view the result.
